oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: UNICEF tour - Australia - 1972 - part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of a 1972 UNICEF fundraiser tour performance in Australia. Featuring Tex Ritter (host), Freddy Weller (performer), Connie Smith (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tex Ritter; Freddy Weller; Connie Smith
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:06) Opening theme -- (00:20) Tex Ritter talks about some country artists transitioning from rock and roll -- (00:55) Ritter introduces Freddy Weller -- (01:27) Promised Land (Freddy Weller) -- (04:25) Weller thanks the audience and introduces the next tune -- (04:40) Okie From Muskogee (Freddy Weller) -- (07:13) Weller introduces Bob Warford and introduces the next tune -- (07:30) Games People Play (Freddy Weller) -- (10:45) Ritter thanks Weller and introduces Connie Smith -- (11:30) Just One Time (Connie Smith) -- (14:00) Smith introduces the next tune -- (14:04) I Never Once Stopped Loving You (Connie Smith)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: UNICEF.; Weller, Freddy, 1947-; Ritter, Tex, 1905-1974; Ritter, Tex; Smith, Connie, 1941-;
